website_summaries.verdict: You've seen them at water aerobics classes; now bring them home to your pool.
pros: Made from EVA foam, which provides buoyancy and low water absorption
Works upper body, lower back, and abs
Holds up well to sun and chlorine
Good for water aerobics, strengthening repetitions, and other exercises
cons: End caps fall out relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: It will shoot up and out the water like a cannon (and might
customer_reviews.text: I had more of an arm workout with these than I did with the one's typically at the pool and you fill with water. they are light.. but holy moley, once you lower them into the water, they turn into a serious water resistance weight. You work your arms keeping them under water, and you work your arms moving them around in the water (and still trying to keep them under water). A small tip. Don't let one go. It will shoot up and out the water like a cannon (and might, um, hit the instructor in the face). My final product review.. I LOVE THEM. you'll feel it the next day.. for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: For this reason I gave it a 3 They were shipped fast and were in perfect condtion. I have used these type weights before ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the largest size dumbbells. I needed the medium or maybe even small. No where on the description was there a size so I took a chance that they might be the correct size. For this reason I gave it a 3 They were shipped fast and were in perfect condtion. I have used these type weights before and they are great, these were just too big for my 4ft 11in older self I did return these with no issues and for that I was grateful. Please add sizes to your add
customer_reviews.author: Jerri  Zachary

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I go to the pool with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I go to the pool with a friend 5 days a week, these provide a great workout. They are high quality with the bar and weights being attached so there is no concern of them fall ing off or sliding. Unlike other dumbbells, the handle can not fill up with water. I just purchased another set as a gift for my friend so we can each have our own. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jlert

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavier
customer_reviews.text: I like these dumbells but they are quite heavy for me. I'm a petite woman and these have been hard to use. I started using just one and little by little after training I'm starting to use two. I don't know how much they would be comparable to being outside of the water but they are more than 5 lbs. each to me. I usually use a 2 or 3 lbs weight in my regular gym and these are heavier than that.
customer_reviews.author: rosegarden1846

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for water dumbells to use in my pool for water aerobics. I was shocked at how much some of them were, and didn't want to spend a fortune, when I wasn't sure how much use I would actually get out of it. This set was at a great price, and works perfectly! It provides amazing resistence in the water, and gives my arms a really good workout. They seem to be holding up well to the use and chlorine. It is about six months and they are still holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Love2talktravel

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Weights
customer_reviews.text: My friend with whom I water walk has these, and I have used them on several occasions. They are lightweight, durable and provide good resistance for a good aquatic workout. I ordered these for myself for Chriistmas. Now I won't have to borrow!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but.....effective?
customer_reviews.text: The few times I've used these, I was impressed with the amount of resistance they provided while "lifting" in the pool. However, a few cons: They came with NO exercise options/instructions to optimize the workout they are supposed to provide, they are awkward to use & control, and the material is basically flimsy styrofoam. Not sure how long these will last with heat & chlorine exposure, but time will tell. I'll update at the end of the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Book Puppy

customer_reviews.title: Suggest additions
customer_reviews.text: These are good dum bells for the pool. I Bought the cheapest ones that were a different color from the ones Art the TMCA. It would be really nice if the industry would assign a weight or equivalent so that when purchasing , it would be possible to know what resistance they are providing. Also, they are (appropriately) too big to fit in my gym bag. Wouldn’t it be nice if there were someway to attach them to my gym bag and let them drain. Maybe a mesh bag that attaches to the handles with asnap Or button?
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Poor Information, not honest. Deceptive.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with directions, does not advise on how to use or how much weight in the water it is(injury waiting to happen), does not tell you country of origin, deceptive. Had I known it was made in china, I would have NEVER bought it. Who knows what it's made out of. It's a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not even "Medium"
customer_reviews.text: I work out with similar weights at the pool. There, we have light, medium and heavy resistance barbells. I was hoping that because there were three "layers" shown, these would be heavy resistance. But I received them today (fast shipping) and the total of all three "color layers" on each barbell is a little less than the medium resistance. I cannot comment on the durability and actual comparison to the medium resistance I am used to until I get in the pool again. If they don't fall apart, I will keep them for occasional use - and keep searching for heavy resistance barbells.
customer_reviews.author: E. Boardman

customer_reviews.title: This dumbell is very strong
customer_reviews.text: From the description, I didn't know how strong the bells would be. It's really difficult for me to keep these under water. I'm going to give it another try. When the aquatic exercise class is large, they run out of dumbells. So some bring their own. I thought I would do the same. Probably will not return them but may donate to the class collection, which are easy to push underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Carol

customer_reviews.title: Nice water weights but...
customer_reviews.text: They are very similar to the ones I had stolen. The only thing I don’t like is that the hand grips are a bit too small for me compared to my other ones. If you have small hands they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE POOL
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FOR THE POOL. RESISTANCE DEPENDS ON HOW YOU HOLD THEM. BARELY ON TOP OR HALF IN THE WATER-STRONG. JUST BELOW WATER LEVEL/UNDER NEATH-MEDIUM. TOTALLY UNDER WATER- LIGHT. EVERYONE'S STRENGTH LEVEL IS DIFFERENT. BUT THEY ARE WORTH IT. I'M DOING PT FOR MY KNEE & THEY HOLD ME UP IN THE DEEP END & MY ARMS GET A NICE WORK OUT.
customer_reviews.author: STARDUSTER247

customer_reviews.title: Aquatic Foam Buoys/Dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these foam buoys/dumbbells to use in my aquatic fitness classes at the gym. They are very versatile - you can use a single buoy or one in each hand, they can be used behind the knees in deep water for stability and core work, or even in between the feet for core work. They provide a good amount of resistance for most participants. The handles are lightly padded which makes gripping them a little easier. The foam does dent/mar easily but it shouldn't affect the usage.
customer_reviews.author: scooterjoey

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit disappointed with the feel of these. They feel like they could break easily. Also, the ends of the weights do not come off allowing you to add water for a better workout. I would spend more money next time and get plastic ones like they have at the gym. Being able to add water to make the weights heavier allows for a better workout in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Trinket

customer_reviews.title: Water Weights at Home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for myself to use at home. Great price & great value. The only thing I would say is I would have liked them to be a little heavier. If you purchase water weights like this look at the description and make sure you know what type you're purchasing. This item is good if you want little resistance in the water. They are perfect for my Senior Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Love My Water Weights
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a workout in the pool. With being stuck in the house all these months due to covid restrictions, these weights are helping lose the weight I've gained. The only exercise I've been getting is walking from the couch to the fridge. After a week of using them every morning, I can see and feel a difference in my arms. I use them for a variety of exercises and would be lost without them. Great value, great product, great addition to my exercise routine. Would recommend buying these water exercise dumbells.
customer_reviews.author: DMBarry

customer_reviews.title: Great pool barbells for exercising in the pool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to workout in the swimming pool for my arms any additional exercises I do in the pool. I walked the pool back and forth using these quotations pulling them down and up down and up in the water and out and then also use them to move forward and it does Tighten Up Your Arms but as you all know you do need to be consistent with that. I recommend these for an adult that is elderly who wants to do a little bit of arm exercises you know minor cardio for themselves. I recommend this product 4 pool exercising
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase !!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They came perfectly packaged AND INTACT. Love the color and the size. I enjoy swimming with them, One observation is that I have a lot of strength upper body because I do physical work but for someone that does not they may be too hard to handle for underwater movements exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss G.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice, both sets arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the first set was damaged with small chunks torn from the material, I asked Amazon to replace, which they kindly did with no charge. The second set arrived damaged too! So disappointing. See the pics I uploaded. Amazon refunded me my original costs and told me to toss both sets, not to go to trouble of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Alive & Well in Oak Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Treat with care
customer_reviews.text: Dents in the foam almost immediately. Afraid they won’t hold up. Also, difficult to determine how resistant they would be in the water so I didn’t know which set to order. A little more resistant than I can do right now as I’m having trouble with my elbows. I tried them out. Love the aqua color. Needs to come with a mesh carry bag so they will hold up to back and forth to pool.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Self

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great workout
customer_reviews.text: I am new to aqua fitness and have been using these for 3 months straight - due to gym closures during COVID. Am THRILLED with the results that aquaweights have given me. I use them in a PLETHORA of pool workouts - both upper and lower body! They still look brand new, after HOURS of pool time. Happy I went with the bigger ones as they offer a bit more resistance, apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, great weights for my pool work out. Even my son who is a fitness instructor, uses them when he comes to do his pool work out.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my own personal set of water weights as the Y uses very few of the size I like. These were advertised as 'heavyweight" yet they are exactly the same as my medium weight ones. If I wanted the same thing I would have ordered another like I had for $5.00 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I am 62, on keto, lost 70 lbs and started working out 2.5 years ago. After moving to Florida and having my own pool, I wanted something new that would be low impact for my joints, so I started working out in the water. These dumbbells are part of my new routine and I’ve learned how to vary the resistance in water to vary intensity of the work out. There is no difference between colors.
customer_reviews.author: BSR

customer_reviews.title: Great value and they do what as expected
customer_reviews.text: What a great value for the $. I’ve never used these before but I’d known about the overall concept of water resistance, which I’ve needed for osteoporosis. I love them. They work the way I expected. Just make sure to keep them out of the grasp of dogs! My youngest golden retriever got ahold of mine and now there a few bite marks and tears. The barbells are soft, but do the job.
customer_reviews.author: CLFSU

customer_reviews.title: Easy Workout
customer_reviews.text: Since the Covid, I have not been able yo use our gym, so having my own pool, I ordered these aqua dumbbells. I watched several videos on the various excercises. Once I got the feel , and the different routines, my upper body was sore!!! I highly recommend these aqua dumbbells. Be patient, and you'll learn the water resistance is a great workout without getting sweaty!
customer_reviews.author: Conni

customer_reviews.title: Best set I've bought!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We use everyday in ocean for water aerobics, and tuck them under our arms or legs for floating- they have proven very durable after almost 2 months of daily use! They do get dented on the foam part if you set something heavy on them, but its dense foam. The handles are easy to hold and well cushioned. This is a sturdy set. Great resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Suzeecq

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product from this vendor
customer_reviews.text: On both dumbbell one end had a cap, the other end the cap was missing so the foam on that end keeps falling off - who in their right mind would ship something that is obviously defective - looks like someone tried to glue it together without the end cap but it didn't work and was shipped in pieces. Can't believe this!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrine Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these water dumbells to work my arms in the pool. The resistance is amazing. I have found so many different ways to use them to exercise not just my arms but my core and legs. These are great value for the money. They have held up with everyday use for a couple of months so far. They dry quickly. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Y

customer_reviews.title: aquatic dumbells
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations with for this product but unfortunately it arrived in a partially crushed box. The bells looked initially fine but after only 2 uses in the pool one of them began to shred and this is a product failure. So I am sending them back and will order from a different source and hopefully will prove to be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: EJS

customer_reviews.title: Good arm workout
customer_reviews.text: These give your arms a good work out when they are in contact with the water. I used to just pool walk and these allow me to do a good work out in the deep end. I have a bad knee and these help to give me a good workout and be pain free
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a water workout!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace water weights that have the smaller cube shape and these provide a lot more resistance to intensify my water aerobics workout. I rated them 3 stars for "easy to use" because they are not easy and make me work, which is their purpose! These seem to be well constructed and match the vendor's description.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable weights!
customer_reviews.text: I love these weights. They work great during water aerobics, or just to use them to workout in the water. I rinse them off after use in the pool, and they have held up very well. I use them several times a week and let them dry out after use. It is so much better having your own set of weights instead of using the weights that everyone else uses at the gym, and mess up.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Useful~!!
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells have added a dimension to my water play (a/k/a workouts) that make them a great buy! They're extremely lightweight to transport yet have a lot of surface area to offer additional resistance in the water. Highly recommend these if you want to up your water game and gently increase upper body strength.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Aquatic Exercise dumbell set
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhh.. I love this product and can't believe that I waited so long to get it. I "suggest" that every person (who is interested) to try it. The first thing they say is ,"ok"! But after they plunge the dumbbells into the water I hear, "Ohhhhh!". They feel what the weight of the water increases resistance. It is a pleasure to exercise in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I have using similar type water weights for the past 20 years...usually provided by gyms where I take classes. With CV19, I decided to purchase a pair to do my own water aerobics. Within a week of light use, they are already banged up and dented. I thought I was getting a good deal when comparing these to others online. Not sure It’s such a deal when I’ll probably have to replace them in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, except for...
customer_reviews.text: Well at first my mom and I loved using these water aerobics weights. They worked great for about 5 uses, then the end caps came off. One cap came off while my mom was using them and the weights flew up out of the water and almost hit her in the head! Not the best design/construction. Ended up having to glue the ends on ourselves. It’s never fun when you almost immediately have to fix a product you’ve bought. So other than the end caps not staying on we really do enjoy these weights and still recommend them. I’m hoping we just got a faulty one and this isn’t the norm.....
customer_reviews.author: jessica rowley

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Love these for water exercises!t This is a good medium level of resistance. You definitely get a good work out! I'd go 5 stars but I find they get dinged up easily. After two not-vigorous uses, I have a couple chunks taken out.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Adds more variation to pool workouts!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered lots of fun exercise moves using the float weight set. It can be used for a variety of moves including using it as a paddle board for a front arm stabilizer while working out your legs. I liked using it mostly as a resistant move for my arms. You can orient the grips in different ways to work on different muscle sets. It certainly added some fun to my workouts in the pool. I like the soft grip too.
customer_reviews.author: A real USA Buyer in California

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea for workout but the quality isn't there
customer_reviews.text: I love them for working out in the pool. The end caps pop off which is annoying. The material seems too thin and weak. Should be more dense material
customer_reviews.author: not satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Diverse in Use
customer_reviews.text: Have not been using them very long but so far so good. Feels similar to working on land but easier! They are large so carrying them to the pool has been a challenge! They work very well as hand holds while kicking and moving across the pool and for stomach exercises. It is actually their size that allows one to try many different movements. Worth the carry!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: They are OK
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit lighter than the bright yellow ones used at my College Water Fitness class; but they will do. The foam is not as dense but they still povide an adequate amount of resistance in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Ms, MB

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my workout. Adds security to a not so great swimmer. Helps with floating, swimming and useful in just standing in one spot and pushing down in water to strengthen arms. Very pleased! I seem to stay in pool and exercise much longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but handed would be better if they had thicker handles.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because the handles are thinner than others I’ve used at the gym’s pool and when I use them for a a full workout they hurt my hands a bit. Otherwise they are good after a month of use. I store them in the deck box out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: CA Family

customer_reviews.title: Adds resistance in the water
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as REAL weights, but still fun to use in the water. Definately adds resistance. Keeps me busy in the pool while floating around, multi tasking while sunbathing/enjoying the pool. You hardly realize your working out but feel it the next day
customer_reviews.author: Kendi!!!

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE - STURDY CONSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.text: I use these aquatic dumb bells regularly in my water aerobics program. They are well constructed and work well. I have a friend who purchased a different brand and hers fell apart in short order. Mine are working well and I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Brightboomer

customer_reviews.title: I've only used them three days but so far I'm very pleased. I wash when I shower off after the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use similar barbells at my gym but after many years the padding has worn off the handles and I find the plastic uncomfortable. I decided to treat myself to my own set so I'll always have the padded handles. The ones at the gym are said to be 5 lbs resistance and these are very similar. I've only used them three days but so far I'm very pleased. I wash when I shower off after the pool because of the high chlorine level.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size; nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size; nice quality. The resistance is just right. They don’t soak up any water. Very nice addition to my water workout.
customer_reviews.author: SnoopyJacksMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Strength Training in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: Upon first glance, you would think, "how effective can these very light styrofoam dumbbells be?" But once you take them underwater, you find out quickly how easily they create resistance. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: My mom purchased these to use for pool exercise when she visited and was concerned that the size listed on line seemed smaller than she was used to from classes, but when they arrived she said they were a good size. I've also found them useful for floating around in lieu of a paddle board and for casual exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: It will work your arms good!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used as much as I need to, but you can tell it will do a great job if the weights are used often.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! but large!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about the size of these but boy do they do the trick. I have had surgery on both my shoulders and the last surgery just was not healing right. Decided to start doing some work in the pool to build strength and mobility. These puppies do the trick. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: dianejmac

customer_reviews.title: Great upper body workout in your pool!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was amazing as always with Amazon! Weights are great for the price. I've been using water dumbbells for years. You can really get a great yer body work out in your pool! My only reason for the 3 is one dumbbell can win a gauge on the top so I'm afraid this will cause them not to last. Otherwise try them! I think you'll like the workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool tool
customer_reviews.text: I really like these dumbells. They are big enough to provide resistance for various exercises and they keep me afloat when I want to do leg exercises in deeper water or just hang loose after a vigorous routine. Of course they add no weight to my bag but they are a bit cumbersome to fit in there. Small price to pay for something so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: End caps come loose.
customer_reviews.text: Good pool exercise toy. Be prepared to glue the end caps back in. I am on my second set . The first ones lasted a long time just had to keep glueing the end cap.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: Misleading !!!
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION!!! The picture is of circular dumbells, the product shipped is triangular.
customer_reviews.author: Frank K

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It gives me hours of entertainment watching my husband workout in our pool. He makes faces like he is lifting 100 pounds and he truly believes he will get super buff. I love him and I love those weights. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Day 2 if using, the black plug which keeps the ends of the weights on, fell off. This makes the weight fall off the handle. Very disappointing. They are now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my in-pool workouts
customer_reviews.text: Great for my in-pool workouts. And hubby likes to stand them on end and see if they'll float all the way around without falling, so it works as a pool toy for a man in his second childhood, too. LOL
customer_reviews.author: JJReader

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I really like using these in the pool. Provides excellent resistance. I’ve only had these for three weeks and they are already falling apart. I’m constantly having to slide one of the ends back on. I guess I’ll glue it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bernard

customer_reviews.title: product looks good, solid
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery,product looks good,solid,attractive color, have not used yet so cannot attest to overall quality, but do not see any noticeable problem with them,they look identical to the ones I have at home for gym use. I bought these to travel with As I excercise on the road. Four stars because I have yet to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jo Haywood

customer_reviews.title: SMALL BUT MIGHTY
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think much at first but under the water they will cause a workout burn!!!! As an MS WARRIOR I spend a lot of time in the pool and they are great for a workout.
customer_reviews.author: knear

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out but fall apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: They are really great and provide a great deal of resistance and buoyancy. However I haven’t had them ver long and they are starting to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kobyleski

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient carrying them
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the aquatic workout weights except the rod is too short so I can’t put one onto the other for easier carrying. Therefore I have to carry them individually and it’s awkward when I’m carrying a beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3 year old, she watches me workout and tries to lift my weights. I didn't want her getting hurt, so I bought this for her as her alternative. She likes them, but they are big. *laughing*
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lyn Royce Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: We have used these several times already and so far GREAT....
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Useless gigantic toy foam
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected and returned it I thought it was weights u can exercise with but it wasnt. It's gigantic stifoam very light weight and useless u can give to a baby to play with it well I'm returning it dont it..
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: POOL EXERCISES
customer_reviews.text: These work great for pool exercises. The are light weight but when put in the water they become resistant to movement and therefore enable you to do exercises in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, & value
customer_reviews.text: I actually need to be very careful with these, I haven't been able to use for a week now. Because I pulled a muscle in my arm. They work great, just know your limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: flimsier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be like the dumbbells at my rec center pool. They are much flimsier. The foam arrived dented and never recovered. Not exactly whot I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lheaven

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment for upper body exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I needed exercise equipment for pool use, and I chose these because they appeared similar to the ones I had used for my water aerobics class. I use them several times a week, and they are great! They are good for working arms and for stabilizing my body when I work my legs, abs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W

customer_reviews.title: Really work
customer_reviews.text: Really wondered if this would work but they really do. They are very easily banged up because of the foam there made out of but once in the water and you’ll feel the impact of them. Love mine
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these almost a month and they work like they should. I'm in the water four times a week and they are holding up well. I've used water dumbbells for over five years, and the last sets I purchased had the ends popping off within days. With these, so far so good! I also like the feel, they are not as stiff as some other brands. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: justkristik

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: *Update: one of my weights fell apart within the first two weeks. These weights were lighter then expected. I was hoping for more of a workout in the pool, but they will work.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda A.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The end of one of the weights does not stay on. Haven't been used that many times. Disappointed that my return opportunity has expired. Received in April 2019 and didn't start using them until pool season started which was in June. Then we had a month of rain. So again, not used very much before they started coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Babsie

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING HEADLINE
customer_reviews.text: I like these. However, the headline is misleading. This is a set of 1 and NOT a set of 2 that I revived.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for a soft easy workout in water. We use it in our community pool daily and people ask to try it always saying they need to get some too. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gertsen

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works fine so far. shipping was slow as it came from third party shipper even though i think it was listed as prime. but it was shipped in USA so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieKay

customer_reviews.title: they're perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grip. Easy to use. I leave them in the spa all the time because my experience has been, they last longer if you DON'T let them dry out each time.
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great aquatic weights!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old son after he used them in a swimming lesson and he absolutely loves them!! They are great for helping him float. Weight wise they seem a little lighter than other floats, but for him they ar perfect!
customer_reviews.author: onehappymomma

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.  Nice product
customer_reviews.text: For water aerobics, a little thin (foam) where you hold them, but other than that they are great. Only used them once so far, hope they hold up, I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Good for Pool Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for aerobic workout in pool. These are just big enough for good resistance and the space between floats fits well behind my knee for leg resistance and is also easy to grasp for arm work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnshine59

customer_reviews.title: Great weights
customer_reviews.text: They were a little pricey but they were great I use them quite a bit in the water I do bicep curls tricep kickbacks and all kinds of other exercises
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Provides a Great work out but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Provides a good workout in the pool. Disappointed that one of the items came damaged in several areas as shown in the picture. Otherwise I would have given this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Garycx

customer_reviews.title: Ends popped off after a few uses in the pool
customer_reviews.text: After just few uses in the pool, the ends popped off. We use them as intended in our backyard pool-light use. The should not have fallen apart so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lore

customer_reviews.title: After two uses in the pool one of the weights came apart on me.
customer_reviews.text: I was using these weights in the pool for the 2nd time and one just came apart- unglued. The first time I used them they were fantastic! I really liked them but they are useless if they won't stay together. I think I have had them too long to return them. It rained a lot so I didn't get to use them right away when I first got them. Too bad b/c they could be really great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Graham

customer_reviews.title: Water workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend who had seen and liked mine. I use them every day and it really firms the upper arms. Invented my own exercises and it seems to be doing the job. Heartily recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ALFRED BURIAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water exercise.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these item for my daughter. She uses them in her workouts. My daughter indicated that they work just fine in the water and loves them. This is exactly what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: georgel

customer_reviews.title: Work fine but gouge easily
customer_reviews.text: These work fine for water aerobics, just store them carefully, as th foam is soft and gouges more easily than other ones I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used them very soon after my purchase arrived and was immediately pleased. They are perfect for some cool pool resistance training! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Resistance
customer_reviews.text: These came in great condition and continued to hold their shape. They add the perfect amount of resistance to our pool work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan G. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These are great for water aerobics. There are similar ones at the pool but these are mine. You can feel the burn a real pump. love them.
customer_reviews.author: pauline

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. All the ladies in my water aerobic class want them or have already ordered. You definitely see improvement in your arms.
customer_reviews.author: Tom's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful!
customer_reviews.text: These little lightweight dumbells are surprisingly useful for exercising your arms, stabilizing your torso while providing resistance when doing many different exercises and providing enough floatation support to relax between or after exercises. Very nice utility! I just hope they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Honest_Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out with little strain
customer_reviews.text: These work great in the pool so much so that I can actually feel the burn hours later. Makes for a good strength workout without much strain.
customer_reviews.author: SUMMER7755

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so my kid can pretend to lift weights with me. They feel durable. I'm sure they work great for their intended water aerobics purpose
customer_reviews.author: jr g.

customer_reviews.title: Love  them!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love exercising with these in the pool. They offer the perfect amount of resistance for building arm strength.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Work GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love these work wonderfully for my special needs child. I also use them for the water workout. We are both able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: No worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They both broke 1 week past the return time. I do not recommend. Its glued as you can see. They need to do something else to keep it together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations Aquatic Exercise Dumbells - Set of 2 - for Water Aerobics
product_meta.description: These easy to store aquatic barbells are a perfect addition to your water aerobics workout. They come as a set of 2 and each weighs .66lbs. Made from EVA foam, they measure 11"long x 6"wide. While the EVA foam has low water absorption, we recommend storing the weights on end in a tray so any water that may have accumulated can drain. The resistance of the barbells will provide an overall workout for your upper body, lower back and abs. Warning: These are not to be used as a flotation device. Made by Trademark Innovations.
feature_bullets: Made from EVA foam, providing buoyancy and low water absorption
Each barbell measures 11" long x 6" wide and weighs .66lbs.
Work your upper body as well as your lower back and abs for a total fitness workout
Warning: Not to be used as a flotation device. For ages 14+
